::Firearm::

Firearm jumps up, his arm cannon ready and set on charge launcher. He aims it 
at Decadel, but before he could fire, the Predacon escapes. Firearm growls, 
walking up to Necromancer and putting a hand on the fellow Maximal's shoulder.

"We'll get her back," he says gravely, "But hysterics won't help."

He looks back at the CF. "Come on, first we have to locate them."
